name: PixOScope
description: PixOScope is a charming oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES Club. With its forest green box, classic buttons, and adorable cat screen, PixOScope is a delightful addition to any tech enthusiast's collection. Equipped with hand-down arms and legs, PixOScope is always ready to assist with various tasks. Its stylish glasses addon enhances its overall appeal and gives it a touch of sophistication.
